Articles.Content:
Hey.

I'm New to the game, I bought it yesterday, so I'm not really that greate yet..

But I wanna build a big spacestation, and a couple of satelites.

So far I've made 2 satelies With a mod that I can't remember the name of, but I want solar panels that og straight out, like really cool solar panels.

I also need stuff that spacestations and satelites should have, but I can't find the right Things.

Can anyone help me With this?

Dan.

PS: Thank you game Developers for making me hooked to another game..
Try some mods at this thread, http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17165-0-17-Kosmos-Spacecraft-Design-Bureau-0-17-LK-parts-released

Here are a few suggestions as of mods and plugins you could install to achieve your dream of space domination.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7790-0-16-Parts-Pack-Deep-Space-Mission-Pack-%280-151-fix-released%29

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/13692-0-16-Mechanical-Mouse-Industries This satellite pack won't be updated as it is but it still works and the modder promised to make a new more awesome one.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/6280-0-17-ExPI-Space-Stations-0-4-Interplanetary-Probes-0-1-2
Kosmos absolutely has the coolest solar panels in the whole Kerbal universe

Nice, the first looks awesome.

But in the file, theres like 22 folders, am I suppose to put all of them into the /Parts folder?

Thank you so much btw !
Where am I suppose to put all of the files for Kosmos? I have a bunch of folders, and a couple of dll. files..
Easier said, I need solar panels that can go in and out.. some really cool ones..

The parts all go in the KSP\Parts

The .dll files are usually the plugins and as such go in the KSP\Plugins folder.

If a plugin comes with a .cfg file, it's probably a resource file and it goes in, yeah you guessed it, KSP\Resources

Good luck with your spacestation.

Can't wait to see it.

Easier said, I need solar panels that can go in and out.. some really cool ones..

As for the solar panels, the MMI satellite pack has some nice folding ones.
The Source folder, where is it suppose to go?
Anywhere you like Daniboo, it's just the code for the plugin, you don't even need to unzip it to be honest.

The source folder doesn't go anywhere. It isn't used by the game.

It is provided so that others can review the code (to either tinker with it, learn from it, check for any mistake, etc).
